   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(maybe_inline_SUITE).
   22: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   23: -export([basic/1, nested/1]).
   24: 
   25: all() ->
   26:     [{group,p}].
   27: 
   28: groups() ->
   29:     [{p,[parallel],
   30:       [basic,nested]}].
   31: 
   32: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   33:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   34:     Config.
   35: 
   36: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   37:     ok.
   38: 
   39: -record(value, {v}).
   40: 
   41: basic(_Config) ->
   42:     {ok,42,fish} = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {ok,fish}}),
   43:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {error,whatever}}),
   44:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => error}),
   45:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => error}),
   46:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {error,whatever}}),
   47:     some_value = basic_1(0, #{0 => #value{v=some_value}}),
   48:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,something_wrong},[_|_]}} = catch basic_1(0, #{0 => something_wrong}),
   49: 
   50:     {ok,life,"universe",everything} = basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   51:                                                    life => "universe",
   52:                                                    "universe" => {ok,everything}}),
   53:     error = basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   54:                          life => "universe",
   55:                          "universe" => error}),
   56:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,not_a_list},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   57:                                                                 life => not_a_list}),
   58:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,not_ok},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   59:                                                                life => "universe",
   60:                                                                "universe" => not_ok}),
   61:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,not_ok},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => not_ok}),
   62: 
   63:     {ok,42,fish,dolphins} = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {ok,fish},
   64:                                          fish => {ok,#value{v=dolphins}}}),
   65:     {error,whatever} = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {error,whatever}}),
   66:     failed = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => failed}),
   67:     failed_early = basic_3(0, #{0 => failed_early}),
   68: 
   69:     y = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else _ -> y end,
   70:     y = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else _ -> x, y end,
   71: 
   72:     x = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else E1 -> E1 end,
   73: 
   74:     6 = maybe X1 = 2+2, X1+2 end,
   75:     6 = maybe X2 = 2+2, X2+2 else {error, T} -> T end,
   76:     {"llo", "hello", "hello"} = maybe Y1 = "he"++X3=Z1 ?= "hello", {X3,Y1,Z1} end,
   77:     {"llo", "hello", "llo"} = maybe Y2 = "he"++(X4=Z2) ?= "hello", {X4,Y2,Z2} end,
   78: 
   79:     whatever = maybe
   80:                    AlwaysMatching ?= id(whatever),
   81:                    AlwaysMatching
   82:                else
   83:                    E2 -> E2
   84:                end,
   85: 
   86:     <<0>> = basic_4(id({<<0>>})),
   87: 
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: basic_1(V0, M) ->
   91:     Res = basic_1a(V0, M),
   92:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_1b(V0, M),
   93:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_1c(V0, M),
   94:     Res.
   95: 
   96: basic_1a(V0, M) ->
   97:     maybe
   98:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
   99:         {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  100:         {ok,V1,V2}
  101:     else
  102:         {error,_} ->
  103:             error;
  104:         error ->
  105:             error;
  106:         #value{v=V} ->
  107:             V
  108:     end.
  109: 
  110: basic_1b(V0, M) ->
  111:     Result =
  112:         maybe
  113:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  114:             {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  115:             {ok,V1,V2}
  116:         else
  117:             {error,_} ->
  118:                 error;
  119:             error ->
  120:                 error;
  121:             #value{v=V} ->
  122:                 V
  123:         end,
  124:     {wrapped,Result}.
  125: 
  126: basic_1c(V0, M) ->
  127:     OK = id(ok),
  128:     Error = id(error),
  129:     Result =
  130:         maybe
  131:             {OK,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  132:             {OK,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  133:             {OK,V1,V2}
  134:         else
  135:             {Error,_} ->
  136:                 Error;
  137:             Error ->
  138:                 Error;
  139:             #value{v=V} ->
  140:                 V
  141:         end,
  142:     {wrapped,Result}.
  143: 
  144: basic_2(V0, M) ->
  145:     Res = basic_2a(V0, M),
  146:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_2b(V0, M),
  147:     Res.
  148: 
  149: basic_2a(V0, M) ->
  150:     maybe
  151:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  152:         V2 = [_|_] = do_something(V1, M),
  153:         {ok,V3} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  154:         {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  155:     else
  156:         {error,_} ->
  157:             error;
  158:         error ->
  159:             error;
  160:         #value{v=V} ->
  161:             V
  162:     end.
  163: 
  164: basic_2b(V0, M) ->
  165:     Result =
  166:         maybe
  167:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  168:             V2 = [_|_] = do_something(V1, M),
  169:             {ok,V3} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  170:             {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  171:         else
  172:             {error,_} ->
  173:                 error;
  174:             error ->
  175:                 error;
  176:             #value{v=V} ->
  177:                 V
  178:         end,
  179:     _ = id(0),
  180:     {wrapped,Result}.
  181: 
  182: basic_3(V0, M) ->
  183:     Res = basic_3a(V0, M),
  184:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_3b(V0, M),
  185:     Res.
  186: 
  187: basic_3a(V0, M) ->
  188:     maybe
  189:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  190:         {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  191:         {ok,#value{v=V3}} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  192:         {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  193:     end.
  194: 
  195: basic_3b(V0, M) ->
  196:     Result =
  197:         maybe
  198:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  199:             {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  200:             {ok,#value{v=V3}} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  201:             {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  202:         end,
  203:     {wrapped,Result}.
  204: 
  205: basic_4({X}) ->
  206:     maybe 
  207:         <<_:(ok)>> ?= X
  208:     end.
  209: 
  210: nested(_Config) ->
  211:     {outer_fail,not_ok} = nested_1(0, #{0 => not_ok}),
  212:     {x,{error,inner}} = nested_1(0, #{0 => {ok,x}, x => {error,inner}}),
  213:     {outer_fail,{unexpected,not_error}} = nested_1(0, #{0 => {ok,x}, x => not_error}),
  214:     ok.
  215: 
  216: nested_1(V0, M) ->
  217:     Res = nested_1a(V0, M),
  218:     {wrapped,Res} = nested_1b(V0, M),
  219:     {wrapped,Res} = nested_1c(V0, M),
  220:     Res.
  221: 
  222: nested_1a(V0, M) ->
  223:     maybe
  224:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  225:         V2 = {error,_} ?=
  226:             maybe
  227:                 {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  228:             else
  229:                 Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  230:             end,
  231:         {V1,V2}
  232:     else
  233:         Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  234:     end.
  235: 
  236: nested_1b(V0, M) ->
  237:     Result =
  238:         maybe
  239:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  240:             V2 = {error,_} ?=
  241:                 maybe
  242:                     {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  243:                 else
  244:                     Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  245:                 end,
  246:             {V1,V2}
  247:         else
  248:             Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  249:         end,
  250:     {wrapped,Result}.
  251: 
  252: nested_1c(V0, M) ->
  253:     Result =
  254:         maybe
  255:             R ?= maybe
  256:                      {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  257:                      {error,_} = V2 ?=
  258:                          maybe
  259:                              {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  260:                          else
  261:                              Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  262:                          end,
  263:                      {V1,V2}
  264:                  else
  265:                      Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  266:                  end,
  267:             R
  268:         else
  269:             Var -> Var
  270:         end,
  271:     {wrapped,Result}.
  272: 
  273: %% Utility functions.
  274: 
  275: do_something(V, M) ->
  276:     map_get(id(V), M).
  277: 
  278: id(X) -> X.
